competitors.name: Cisco Webex
competitors.notes: Big name in corporate video conferencing with impressive boardroom and office credentials, one of the most well-known alternatives to Zoom

competitors.name: Skype
competitors.notes: Go-to platform for personal video chat since 2003 beta release, one of the biggest Zoom competitors from day one

competitors.name: GoToMeeting
competitors.notes: Used for both internal and external meetings with elegant screen sharing and drawing features, simple to use

competitors.name: Discord
competitors.notes: Launched in 2015, initially developed for gamers to interact and form communities, later expanded to various online communities

competitors.name: BlueJeans
competitors.notes: Conferencing platform with integrated audio and video fidelity, comprehensive security options, one-click join without account requirement

competitors.name: Google Meet
competitors.notes: Formerly Hangouts Meet, best-known video meeting platform available free for anyone with Google or Gmail account

competitors.name: Microsoft Teams
competitors.notes: All-in-one tool for video conferencing, team chat, phone calls, file sharing, and day-to-day work communications

competitors.name: IBM Sametime
competitors.notes: Provides real-time communication through instant messaging and audio/video conferencing, allows file sharing without limit

context: Zoom Video Communications, Inc. is a video communications platform company focused on video meetings, webinars, and collaboration tools. Enterprise video meeting platform growing.
